subject: Re: Is Simsonn Getting the Recognition It Deserves?
description_text:
Hey Simsonn Team,


Just wanted to follow up on my message about a potential collaboration.


If now’s not the right time or you're focused elsewhere, no worries at all,
just let me know.


Looking forward to hearing from you!


Thanks,

Tbo Soto

conversations.body_text: Hi Tbo,  Thanks for following up — we appreciate you reaching out!  Before we move forward, could you let us know a bit more about the type of collaboration you’re looking for? For example:    Are you hoping for product sponsorship, a creator discount, or an affiliate partnership?    What type of content are you planning to create? (unboxing, review, comparison, long-term testing, racing POVs, etc.)    Which Simsonn products are you most interested in featuring?    Once we understand your collaboration idea more clearly, we’ll be able to evaluate the best way to work together.  Looking forward to your reply!

Hi Simsonn Team,

Thank you so much for getting back to me.

For the kind of collaboration I’m proposing, a *product sponsorship / paid
UGC partnership* would be the best fit. This allows me to create
high-quality, ad-ready content for your brand to use across your organic
channels and paid campaigns.

I’d love to work with one of your premium items, especially the *Simsonn
Turbo Pro Steering Wheel*, as it has strong visual appeal and great ad
potential.

Here are two content concepts I can create for your brand:

*1. Unboxing + Premium Build Quality Breakdown*
A clean, high-energy unboxing that focuses on the tactile feel,
craftsmanship, and standout features of the Turbo Pro. This would include
close-up shots, hero angles, and an ad-friendly script highlighting key
benefits, perfect for Reels, TikTok, or Meta ads.

*2. POV: Level Up Your Racing Setup*
A fast-paced POV clip showing the steering wheel in use; hands-on, smooth
turns, responsiveness, and the overall immersive experience. Shot in a UGC
style but polished enough to convert in paid ads.

If this structure works for you, I’m happy to move forward with the next
steps.

Looking forward to your response!
*Tbo*
*Male UGC Creator | **https://tbodidthat.my.canva.site/
<https://tbodidthat.my.canva.site/>*


On Mon, Nov 24, 2025 at 12:38 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi ,
Happy new month, I hope you had an amazing thanksgiving.  I just wanted to
circle back to hear your thoughts on my last message.
Looking forward to hearing back from you.
*Tbo*
*Male UGC Creator | **https://tbodidthat.my.canva.site/
<https://tbodidthat.my.canva.site/>*
